title: I Bought The MOST FAMOUS Yugo In The World (And It's MUCH WORSE Than You Think)
author: Tavarish
description:
Get the Advance Auto Parts App►http://bit.ly/Tavarish_AdvanceApp
Enter 'TAVARISH25" at checkout to get up to 25% off!►https://bit.ly/AdvanceTav
Thanks to Advance Auto Parts for supporting this video series and my channel!
--------------------------------------------------------------------
Today, I bought the worst car ever made - a 1986 Yugo GV, which happens to be world famous as the most viewed Yugo on YouTube, being on channels like Doug Demuro, VinWiki, Aging Wheels, and this one. It's also very, very broken, so let's see if we can fix it, shall we?
